mdRecord.dcterms:title: Views of Mount Vernon, Virginia. No. 10; Tomb of Washington
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of Washington's tomb at Mount Vernon, 1866-1875. Mounted on yellow board. A label affixed to the reverse of the cardboard mount includes a list of 10 views - the tomb is No. 10. The label reads: Views at Mount Vernon, Virginia. Photographed and Published by Alex. Gardner, 921 Penn. Ave., Washington, D. C. for the Ladies' Mount Vernon Association. Subject indicated by a mark under the name and number. For sale only at Mount Vernon. A handwrite note in ink notes, "9th June, 1873"
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799--Tomb
